entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
